subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The free-agent shortstop Jhonny Peralta and the St. Louis Cardinals have agreed on a four-year contract, giving Peralta, an All-Star, a fresh start after his Biogenesis drug suspension.
snippet: The free-agent shortstop Jhonny Peralta and the St. Louis Cardinals have agreed on a four-year contract, giving Peralta, an All-Star, a fresh start after his Biogenesis drug suspension.
